mainText:
i can't really add anything of substantive value other than to say what most other people have already offered.  certainly a great loss.  perhaps one of the most memorable and lasting impressions of him that i will have, though, is his stanford commencement address.  that was truly inspired and i know i will come back to it often when i need some perspective and inspiration. for me, his words may just affect me more than anything else.

WWSJD
author: Alex
